Documentation

Welcome to the Counter Documentation. Here you'll find any information you need to know on how to install and use Counter. Feel like something is missing, or found a typo? Go open an issue on GitHub and I'll try my best to update the Documentation as soon as possible. Any bugs you found can be reported there as well.

Happy Hacking! CupOfTea696

Counter is maintained by CupOfTea696.
